filter.inkscape:label: Combined Lighting
filter.inkscape:menu-tooltip: Basic specular bevel to use for building textures

path.style: font-size:18.3444px;font-family:'Arial Rounded MT Bold';-inkscape-font-specification:'Arial Rounded MT Bold, ';fill:#ffff00;stroke:#ff0000;stroke-width:10;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;filter:url(#filter14)

tspan.style: font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:normal;font-stretch:normal;font-size:28.6631px;font-family:'Arial Rounded MT Bold';-inkscape-font-specification:'Arial Rounded MT Bold, ';fill:#ffff00;stroke:none;stroke-width:3.19019
